text: Inene! Abo iingelosi zibathathayo (ekufeni) lo gama bezenze gwenxa iziqu zabo (njengoko baye bahlala nabantu abangakholwayo nangona ukufuduka kwakunyanzelekile kubo, iingelosi ziya kuthi (kubo): “Nanikwimeko enjani nina (ehlabathini)?” Baphendule: “Sasibuthathaka, sicinezelekile emhlabeni”. Zize (iingelosi) zithi: “Ingaba umhlaba ka-Allâh wawungebanzanga ngokwaneleyo na ukuba nifuduke apho nanikhona?” Abo bantu banjalo baya kufumana ikhaya labo esiHogweni, esinjani ukungcola sona isiphelo sohambo
